summary: A silent homage to the origins of cinema, recreating the apparent disappearance of a French photographer in the 1920s. Experimental.
cast: Juliette Gautier|Ivon Orvain|Anne Céline Auche|Céline Laurent|Simone Mercier|Carles Romagosa|Lola Besses|René Flory|Marc Montserrat|Laetitia Andrieu|Jessica Andrieu|Cédric Andrieu|Margot Gaultier|Jonathan Roulot
title: Tren de sombras
